SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETCURRENTOPPORTUNITYSTATUSCODEID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the current opportunity sponsorship status (Sponsored, Prospect Sponsored, Formerly Sponsored, ...)
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETCURRENTOPPORTUNITYSTATUSCODEID ( @sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin declare @statusID uniqueidentifier
if @sponsorshipID is not null select @statusID = CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION where ID = @sponsorshipID
return @statusID end
